data.name: Alone With You - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Written, composed, performed and recorded by Ivor Stines. The Official Soundtrack to Alone With You features all 30 tracks from the game, fully mastered and presented here in high-quality MP3 format. Shake that space-booty with over an hour of moody, funky tunes.

Track list:

1. Title Screen (00:32)
2. Intro (02:10)
3. Colony A (02:58)
4. Waking The AI (01:39)
5. Mission Select (00:34)
6. Heading Out (00:44)
7. Comms Relay (03:40)
8. Agro-Domes (03:01)
9. The Caves (03:12)
10. Colony B (02:56)
11. Winnie (02:33)
12. The Garden (04:16)
13. Signal Tower (02:43)
14. The Refinery (03:12)
15. Medical Centre (02:40)
16. Finding William (00:34)
17. Pierre (02:30)
18. Relay Hub (02:43)
19. Habitat Centre (03:33)
20. Living Quarters (03:36)
21. Research Lab (04:16)
22. Jean (03:00)
23. The Rift (01:16)
24. Terraforming Fields (01:25)
25. Discoveries (01:16)
26. Leslie (02:41)
27. Special Evenings (02:17)
28. With You (03:07)
29. Alone (03:25)
30. End Credits (00:54)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: A PC with speakers would do nicely.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: A Mac with speakers is preferable.
  • Additional Notes: N/A

data.legal_notice: Alone With You is © 2016–2017 Benjamin Rivers Inc. All rights reserved. Soundtrack is © 2016-2017 Ivor Stines.
